website_summaries.verdict: TOTO's electronic bidet is a user favorite for included luxuries like a heated seat, a warm air dryer, self-cleaning wand, and an automatic air deodorizer.
pros: This unit is extremely easy to install and easy to attach
It's effective and offers both a front and rear warm water cleanse, making it versatile
Both the front and rear water spouts can be adjusted to the desired pressure and temperature so each user can enjoy the experience they want
cons: There's a weight limit of 250 lbs
This bidet isn't great for kids or for anyone who may fidget when sitting on the toilet seat, as it will move

customer_reviews.title: TOTO Washlet A100 review
customer_reviews.text: It was simple to install and easy to use. My Costco case of toilet paper is lasting a long, long time. It is the most basic model and is more than enough for a regular person. Older people who can't twist to look down at the controls might want to get the one with the remote control.
customer_reviews.author: stinky

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit all toilets!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. After traveling to Japan where bidet toilet seats are EVERYWHERE (I think it's a cultural thing), I had to have one installed. This seat does everything as advertised. In addition, it was easy to install (it took me less than 20 minutes!). There is a plastic plate to install where you slide your toilet assembly so make sure the surface where you install the plate can lie flat. The plate has to lay flat on the toilet (around 1 1/4 inch from edge of toilet/water). In addition, you don't want the bowl that holds the water to encroach to the toilet seat. See how the back of the toilet seat is flat.
customer_reviews.author: D Hong

customer_reviews.title: ... comes from my enthusiasm for bidets in general (more comfortable, more ecological
customer_reviews.text: Most of my enthusiasm for this product comes from my enthusiasm for bidets in general (more comfortable, more ecological, and less expensive in the long term. Everyone should use one). As bidets go, this the only one of which I'm aware that both lets you use warm water and doesn't need to connect to the hot water line to your sink, which wouldn't work for us. It definitely looks a little clunky/clinical, but it's very convenient to use. Overall, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Matt. S.

customer_reviews.title: you likely know what these are and how nice it is to use one
customer_reviews.text: If you’ve been to Japan, you likely know what these are and how nice it is to use one. This is the model that I saw the most, and now I have one of my own. Make sure to read the installation instructions! It’s all fairly simple and no special tools or skills are required, but you will need an electrical outlet within several feet of your toilet and most American bathrooms aren’t wired like this.
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This one came with no installation instructions or kit as advertized. It did have three booklets in three languages with detailed user guide and maintainance instructions but no installation guide. I could have googled installation instructions or bought required parts separately but the seat opening is too small for an adult man. Nice idea but bad design.
customer_reviews.author: atiwary

customer_reviews.title: Proprietary Adapter - Stay Away!
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the reviews for this thing more carefully. The adapter that comes with this device does not work on standard 1/2" fittings. I went to my local hardware store looking for adapters and none fit. The adapter is proprietary or perhaps metric - either way if you ever have a problem you will need to replace the whole thing. I couldn't get it installed so sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Consummat Pro

customer_reviews.title: Include the extension cord if it is NECESSARY and don't force people to buy it
customer_reviews.text: If most people need the TOTO WASHLET 6 Inch Extension Hose Kit, THU9090R to tight the pipe without any leaking, INCLUDE it in the box! DO NOT try to make another profit from your customer by forcing me to have to spend another $35 dollars to buy the hose!
customer_reviews.author: Sheng

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it unless you know your bathroom plumbing is compatable with it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product during the holiday season. I watched the video about this seat. It seems very easy to install it. After I received it and opened it today, I found it is not compatible with the pipe I have in my bathroom. My bathroom was just remodeled and all the pipe is installed by the village code. I have to return it (which is too much hassle) or hire a professional to install it for me. So DONOT buy it unless you know your bathroom plumbing will fit it!!!
customer_reviews.author: owen

customer_reviews.title: Caution
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product if you do not have direct access to the 7/8" connection on the bottom of your tank.
customer_reviews.author: Ting-Hsuan C.

customer_reviews.title: nice bidet toilet seat
customer_reviews.text: We've had several Toto Washlet Electronic Bidet Toilet seat and we have loved them all. I would have given this product a 5 star if their connector was easier to install. It took two of us more than one hour to align the male connector from the toilet seat to the female connector from the toilet water tank. We bought 2 seats and this issue was the only thing that we did not like. Hope Toto can improve on that soon.
customer_reviews.author: Derek C

customer_reviews.title: Junction Valve Is Defective
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product one star only because it's junction valve. First day, I spent 3 hours on its valve and could not fix the water leak. The reason is that their washer provided is not enough. I had a generic Sterling Toilet in my apt and I really don't think this is my toilet issue. For me, I had to buy a brass washer and end up using a rubber one. I really hate the way how they control their budget. You can not save some money on something really important like a valve.
customer_reviews.author: venus

customer_reviews.title: Not for USA
customer_reviews.text: I live in the USA. I could not find a proper pipe fitting to connect water hose from the tee to my water tank. And the to the wall faucet
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan C. Pacleb

customer_reviews.title: it's great.
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand why this bulky cumbersome thing couldn't be designed to fit under the reservoir tank, instead ofin front of it... and I wish there was a guide for confirming the toilet seat shape of your toilet. This is a Toto Washlet, and my toiletis a Toto as well... it's not perfectly round, so I wrongly assumed I needed the oval unit. Other than these gripes, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Coop

customer_reviews.title: Water does not stay hot
customer_reviews.text: When I researched the Washlets, and read the reviews, I saw nothing about a reservoir tank that only gives you 2 minutes of warm water...Not a happy camper. Apparently the only warm water is in the reservoir tank which is small. Once that's gone you're stuck with cold water on your bum and other lady bits. If I had wanted an expensive one I would have bought an expensive one. But apparently, according to Toto customer service, the 500 series stays warm. Why didn't anyone comment on this? NOT A HAPPY CAMPER!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must Have Toto Washlet.
customer_reviews.text: I own three Toto Washlets, two with mechanical knobs for adjusting and the digital/ electrical one that is the subject of the review. I like all three but each model has its advantages and disadvantages. The mechanical one has better water pressure but the digital model has adequate pressure if set on high. The digital model has motorized wand positioning and an oscillating spray both of which I find very desirable. My one complaint with the digital model is that the seat opening is too small. I weigh 150 pounds, and if it’s too small for me I can imagine how a 200 pounder would feel about it. The opening obviously was designed for Japanese behinds.
customer_reviews.author: AFI

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs this! Men too!
customer_reviews.text: I bought three different units from $200 to $500. This unit wins, hands down, albeit it is the least expensive. As a man I don't want another item I might drop into the toilet, so the fixed control is great. Super easy install, very intuitive. My kids love it too!!!
customer_reviews.author: SB Investor

customer_reviews.title: All You Need
customer_reviews.text: This basic Washlet has all the features you need. The only things lacking are the bowl mist and the deodorizer. In my opinion both these items are gimmicks to get you to buy more expensive seats. In addition, there is no blow dryer which, if you read reviews of more expensive models, rarely accomplishes what a simple drying pat with a piece of toilet paper does. My major concern was that my American Standard Cadet fully skirted toilet (with top mounted seat) would not accommodate the Washlet. Well, it easily does. The Washlet actually comes with a top mount kit and fits perfectly. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: As unfamiliar as bidets and like products are, there is absolutely nothing about it that I would change. The sprayers work great, and leave you feeling much cleaner. Maybe the heaters are a bit of a wasye of energy, but they're ok, and they can be turned off easily enough. The main thing is that the seat itself is quite comfortable. I'm not sure what all toilets this fits I ended up buying a new Toto to match, and it's been great too, the only truly single-flush toilet I've ever owned, which finally lives up to the low-flow promise.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Basically it was easy to install. It's best to study the pictures first before attempting to install. Written instructions, or step by step instructions would've been easier to follow and greatly reduce the installation time. One suggestion is to connect the hose to the fill valve before doing the other hose connections. Make sure not to cross thread (from experience on this installation). Should take less than an hour if done properly.
customer_reviews.author: RMA

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Good power, comfortable. Only drawback is at full pressure the water turns from warm (where I have it set) to cold after about 30-45 seconds of washing.
customer_reviews.author: dmgdvm

customer_reviews.title: Not so easy to install, but once it was in, my wife has enjoyed it very much
customer_reviews.text: The only way to install this toilet seat and connect it to the plumbing I had was to buy a connector. That connector was not available at my local Home Depot. So, I had to order it on-line. Once I had the adapter, the installation went smoothly. It connected to the plumbing without leaks. Once installed, my wife has made good use of both the seat warming and bidet functions of the seat. She enjoys both very much.
customer_reviews.author: Midamerican

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what's advertised and installation is easy. Just be careful about the threads and you'll have no problems with leaking. The hardest part is getting the electrical outlet, but if you have that then the rest is simple.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have five toilets and I have 5 Toto toilet seats.
customer_reviews.author: tweedy

customer_reviews.title: Not working after 6 weeks use, cannot find after service!
customer_reviews.text: Bought and installed A100 in July. Start using in Nov. After several weeks use, stopped working. Lights on, seat can warm up. But after power on, rod out and back, then no action when button pressed. No water come out. Where can I find customer service? Any warranty on the product? How long?
customer_reviews.author: NOVAMICO

customer_reviews.title: THIS ITEM MUST BE RETURNED
customer_reviews.text: WHEN MY PLUMBER CAME TO INSTALL IT WAS DISCOVERED THAT THIS ITEM WILL NOT NO WHERE FIT ON ANY OF MY UNITS..IN FACT HE HAS TALKED ME INTO ORDERING A ENTIRE ONE PIECE UNIT..WITH THE WASHLET INC.,.I WOULD HOPE U UNDERSTAND THAT MY WAIT FOR MY PLUMBER WAS NOT CONSIDERED AS ANY EMERGENCY.......
customer_reviews.author: tony mariani

customer_reviews.title: Poor value.
customer_reviews.text: I have installed and used 3 alpha GX’s. I tried to order another one but the best option available was this ToTo. Toto is considered a very good “toilet” product. I had to spend more and I got less. This unit is nowhere as nice as the Alpha. Spent more. Got far less. Install for Alpha was 15 min. Install for Toto was an hour. Very disappointed. Alpha is available again. Stop shopping! Buy the Alpha!
customer_reviews.author: compass69

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but not as good quality material as it used to be
customer_reviews.text: I had its old model from 8 yrs ago. It’s still in service. Compared to the old model, it seems that toro cheap out the material used. The old model feels more sturdy and thicker. The new one has lighter feel and cheaper plastics. The water heater is either a bit too hot or too cold. Can’t adjust to my preference The water can be too strong or weak. Again, not to my preference. Will probably but again since I still have a good experience so far. May look for other model if I need to get another one
customer_reviews.author: Adrien

customer_reviews.title: I'd rather get another Brondell
customer_reviews.text: After yet another Brondell died and these Totos went on sale, I picked up a couple of the Totos. If I'd never used a Brondell, I'd think this was the sh... you know. However, the Totos have a less comfortable stream with a less-useful oscillation. It does the job, but I prefer the Brondell. We'll see how long it lasts in comparison. Typically we get 3-7 years out of the Brondells. Our water is very hard. Also the toto remote is too big and ugly.
customer_reviews.author: You Can Do Better

customer_reviews.title: Love my TOTO
customer_reviews.text: Odd kind of thing to say but this was a Christmas gift from a few years ago. Enjoying the warm seat everyday . I also gifted this to my father . He too enjoys having the convenience of all the features. Let’s just be clear on a few housekeeping things . #1 you should pre wipe. #2 Let the water do it’s job . #3 post wipe/dry. I do have to say that when I can’t use my My toilet seat , I feel dirty when I can’t cleanse my bottom after using the bathroom. Buy it ! Don’t hesitate .
customer_reviews.author: UD8352

customer_reviews.title: Great product EASY to install!
customer_reviews.text: The product is great. I love the warm seat and the sprays of warm water. This was VERY EASY to install! This product does need a 3 prong power outlet, which I installed in the wall via the attic and run the line down inside the wall. This was the only complicated part. The install of the seat is easy
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lee Admire Jr

customer_reviews.title: Returned the A100 for C100, more features for not much more money!
customer_reviews.text: Great toilet seat! Reminds me of being in Japan again. Really easy to install. There are two models with the side-panel controls. A100 and C100, get the C100 if you want the additional features Pre-Mist and Dryer (you need the dryer!), Otherwise they are the same. Ended up buying A100 and realised it did not have a dryer and returned it for the C100. I hope this was helpful :)
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Minor install issue but it was fixed with a quick trip to Home Depot.
customer_reviews.text: My threads did not match up to the old fill valve and TOTO support just told me they only have one t connector. I ended up getting a new Fluidmaster PerforMAX Fill Valve from Home Depot for $20 and the threads lined up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Brockettmang

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  I hae one on both toilets.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bidet toilet seat. It works well, but the water flow isn't as great as my original TOTO for some reason. No matter how I try to adjust it, it's just not as great.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Seals

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size for my toilet
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize but I didn't know that this product would not fit all commodes. So I had to send them back. I have used this product at my son's house and I liked it very much and that is why I ordered two of them. Even though they did not work for me, I still gave them a 5 star rating because they are nice. I will order some for my Kohler toilets.
customer_reviews.author: Magic Mike

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Added this model to all 3 of our bathrooms. Looks nice on our Toto toilets, also love the energy saving mode, was easy to install. No remote not a big deal, it’s so easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: TAMARA

customer_reviews.title: Horribly designed Bidet. Do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: The round toilet seat is tiny and uncomfortable. No I’m not a big person. Normal. The fixed controls are impossible to access. Wish I’d spent the extra money for a remote control. Really hate this unit because the shape size and controls render it totally useless. Going to buy three more For my vacation home and will certainly look elsewhere. Don’t buy this unit! Perhaps one with the remote might make it acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey

customer_reviews.title: Love these seats
customer_reviews.text: This is our second both I ordered from Amazon. With the other one I ordered a toilet too, can you imagine a toilet delivered by Amazon. My husband thought I was nuts. We traveled in Japan and fell in love with these seats. Heated in the winter and warm water to rinse what you want to be rinsed. My husband installed it by himself with only one hardware store trip. Wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Lake House Granny

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Our Butts Clean
customer_reviews.text: We wanted TOTO due to it being a Japanese brand, but didn't want to spend $500 or more on it, so we went with the base model here for $249, the least expensive of their lineup. Works great. Has all the features we needed and nothing we don't. Installation was very simple, I had it up and running in twenty minutes. Feels sturdy, we hope it lasts. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: J. Revell

customer_reviews.title: Life Changer
customer_reviews.text: I know the title sounds dramatic, but this really has unilaterally solved a problem for me that has persisted for years. I have not found a better value purchase in my personal life to date. Thank you TOTO!
customer_reviews.author: MISTER CHRISTER

customer_reviews.title: ahhhh fresh.
customer_reviews.text: this is a great addition to our master bathroom. it’s a big awkward looking but really does a great job. it’s well built and easy to install and use. i actually installed it while under the urgency to use it and it went right in. now i look forward to my toilet time. ahhhh. fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Donutlou

customer_reviews.title: requires electric outlet near toilet
customer_reviews.text: My bathroom does not have an electric outlet nor would I have one installed that close to a water supply. Therefore returned item.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade your lifestyle--save the planet
customer_reviews.text: Many people don't know that bidets are actually environmentally friendly. You use less water all around (because it also takes water to make AND ship tissue) and you also use less tissue. The ToTo washlet is a definite lifestyle upgrade and, I promise, once you get one, you'll never go back. Installation is quick and easy and comes with all the necessary parts.
customer_reviews.author: c-bert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Another great buy for our new home! worth every panny and i totally love it!
customer_reviews.author: C Money

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says it does
customer_reviews.text: Works like a bidet but retrofits onto a typical American toilet. After reading other reviews I decided to get the elongated model rather than round bowl, and boy am I glad I did. The rectangular piece at the back of the washlet has to fit between you and the tank, so it uses up some space, and I would not want use this without the elongated seat. Not interested in tucking in sensitive body parts against cold porcelain.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie B

customer_reviews.title: good bidet. very large. the warm water capacity is limited
customer_reviews.text: We like this bidet seat. it functions well. However the profile is very large and feels like it takes up a great deal of space. Has a long-lasting plastic smell like a hospital or something.
customer_reviews.author: SamG

customer_reviews.title: Like this product
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it's easy to freshen up any time of day. I always wanted a Bidet but didn't have the space for two commodes, so this option is very practical and convenient. Have already outfitted two bathrooms, two more to go. TOTO Products are great!
customer_reviews.author: M. W.

customer_reviews.title: Don't use the washer
customer_reviews.text: I thought that the included T junction was broken since it was leaking water like crazy, but after following the advice of random strangers on the Internet, I removed the washer and the T junction no longer leaked. I've had it installed for a few weeks now and there still is no leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Zaitev11

customer_reviews.title: Toto washlet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this from “ open box “ deal. The first one I got broken screw from the bidet, so water leaked from the screw connection. I had to return it and got another one. This time everything is working. It was easy to install and, very nice! Five stars!!
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy install fit great on Kohler toilet. Water temp. Is good and can be regulated. I would highly recommend. Thank you Corona Virus pandemic TP hoarders for forcing me to make a great buy. No need to have extra T P and my bumm is clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this purchase. Would like to buy more for my other bathrooms but the price has gone up significantly since covid started. Price gouging. I don't need a remote control. Just something else to lay around.
customer_reviews.author: canoe man

customer_reviews.title: Current re-engineered plastic fittings are not interchangeable with older similar models
customer_reviews.text: Our old Toto SW824-01 which still works fine after purchasing it in 2005 was ready for replacement, however the re-engineered plastic fittings on the current models are not interchangeable with the connections I have to use on my Japanese toilet. So unfortunately I had to return it. Will buy again when I am back in U.S.
customer_reviews.author: Donald E. Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Every house should have at least one
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a whim and didn’t have high hopes, I also didn’t really know what to expect. But, this is a game-changer! The cleanliness is freeing. I know it sounds weird to say but if you get one you’ll understand completely what I mean. I installed it in my master bathroom and I have had friends go missing only to find out they were just hanging out on it.
customer_reviews.author: R. McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Best bathroom upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. You need to have an outlet near the toilet to install this. Options include a warm seat, warm water, and various settings depending upon your preferences. Best investment for our bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Joan B.

customer_reviews.title: A whole new world of comfort and hygene
customer_reviews.text: Warm seat always a treat. The warm rinse programmable for pressure, location (front and back) and oscillating or not may feel like an invasion of personal space at first but anticipated with pleasure ultimately. Needs a nearby power outlet. No air dry on this affordable unit.
customer_reviews.author: el ciego

customer_reviews.title: Toto quality!
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional Japanese quality, as usual! It is the cheapest model by Toto, but definitely contains enough functions for daily use. Took 30min to install by a novice female petit lady - it's easy!
customer_reviews.author: Cen

customer_reviews.title: Good Washlet
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly as described, I been using for a month lets see how much it last. It makes the toilet look from the future, I'm regretting not buying the model with air dryer. It was easy to install if you made sure the type of toilet can has the space described in the pictures. The washlet takes more maintenance than a regular toilet seat, as it would be expected. I'll update the review in a few months, so far happy.
customer_reviews.author: John Rockford

customer_reviews.title: Can't sit on toilet seat lid
customer_reviews.text: The toilet seat fit and function are fine. My complaint is the toilet lid cover. It's at angle, slippery and you really can't sit on it. People are often used to being able to use the toilet lid as a seat. The lid cover does unclip and it would be nice if someone sold one that was flat. I have an older NAIS Panasonic unit and it has a nice solid flat lid. By the way, a lot of people are confused about the Toto supplied tee. IT ATTACHES DIRECTLY TO BASE of 7/8" TOILET FILL VALVE (and NOT to wall shutoff valve).
customer_reviews.author: Pingu Eisenman

customer_reviews.title: Beware about the seat
customer_reviews.text: the Shape of the seat is not comfortable at all. Everybody in my home complained for this one compared to others. we have to keep it because one month passed.
customer_reviews.author: T L

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Toto is a fantastic product. Had another brand before, the one made in the Wisconsin company that makes plumbing products and start with K, and it was four times more expensive and broke three times. Now we have three Toto ones and they work extremely well. Never will buy a anything gain!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install (watch a video or two on YouTube if you get confused), base model bidet seat that works exactly as advertised. Minimal tools needed (an adjustable wrench and a Phillips screwdriver), clicks in and out of place for easy cleaning, and ergonomic for comfy going.
customer_reviews.author: T. Tomblin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: we are very disappointed ....the heater for the water doesn't stay on and its very annoying....would like to hear back from seller on this....maybe need to get another to see if this one is just defective....
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sessedon

customer_reviews.title: Toilet Paper Shortage
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because of the TP shortage. I was not going to put myself through that stress again. I installed this myself, following the instructions without a problem. Everything works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: DBL

customer_reviews.title: Seamless integration into American bathrooms
customer_reviews.text: Toto, a Japanese company, has its bidet toilets everywhere in Japan and this toilet is not any different. This bidet is great build quality, easy to install, and English controls. The Soft Close lid is the probably one of the nicest features but just make sure to check your toilet screws to see if its compatible.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Vu

customer_reviews.title: You will need and electrical outlet adjacent to the toilet
customer_reviews.text: I initially ordered a Lux-Bidet attachment, however it would not fit on our toto toilets. I took the leap and ordered the toto washout seat, and happy that I did, even though I had to have an electrician install an outlet adjacent to the toilet. My wife and I are both very happy with the seat. I initially didn't think we needed a heated seat, but find it is really nice. I have only had this seat for two months, so can't speak to it's longevity.
customer_reviews.author: glen milligan

customer_reviews.title: I would regard this as more important an invention than iPhone.
customer_reviews.text: Work great. Had a different model also made by Toto. Both great.
customer_reviews.author: Joe in Murray, UT

customer_reviews.title: Lovely its improved!
customer_reviews.text: We love this product, I bought (2) sets first floor and second floor. We had old type of washlet long time(10 years no major problem!) and now replace this product. Its so improved and better!! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Hirorinskywalker

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious warm seat and cleaning functions.
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this house, the guest bathroom had an older model of this same Toto Washlet. Initially, I thought it was a little odd, but quickly came to appreciate the nice warm seat and cleaning functions. When I accidentally stepped on it and broke the seat, I knew I had to replace the old one. This product was nearly identical to the old one, with a few updates. My guests really appreciate it too. It was easy to install, and I plan to get 2 more for the other toilets in the house. Really a luxury!
customer_reviews.author: kelly strode

customer_reviews.title: Make sure that understand the warranty because this is a very expensive toilet seat cover
customer_reviews.text: When the product works its very nice, however, the product malfunction very easily. I bought my unit last July and its less than one year and the product has malfunctioned and does not work effectively anymore. The wand gets stuck and does not retract. The button that turns on the seat warmer and the warm water does not work any more.
customer_reviews.author: Verna G.

customer_reviews.title: Leaving you wet on the bottom...
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed, no blow dryer, ended up using just as much toilet tissue as before to dry. I completely missed that. No wonder why it was cheap for Toto. For the same price, I should of gotten a Bindell, which I have in other bathroom in my house.
customer_reviews.author: crazyhorse

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Took a bit for me to have it installed. I thought that this product had an a air dry mode (it does not ) this seat does not fit my seat very well, it hangs over and you can see the rim of the bowl! Sadly,given the time I had to wait to have installed,my return window closed 6 days ago!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret M. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought one a long time ago!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted one forever and the covid-19 toilet paper frenzy was a perfect reason to go ahead and buy one! No regrets! Kiss it tp dependents! 😂🤣
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: The toto  is the best
customer_reviews.text: My toto is a very functional device I highly recommend it easy install all parts fit and is worth every penny I am getting 2 more
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Works well without remote control
customer_reviews.text: This Toto bidet comes with an armchair controller on the right side, which made it convenient for our bathroom configuration. You also don't need to worry about mounting a remote control and changing batteries. The temperature and water pressure are controllable and appropriate.
customer_reviews.author: KS in Alohaland

customer_reviews.title: Wash feels Great !
customer_reviews.text: Good for elongated toilet. If you have medium/small stool this is can work but not the best fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff C.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing!!
customer_reviews.text: The top part had a permanent finger prints on the gloss finish. It is very visible. I contacted customer service and after many exchanges my washlet was replaced, but the new one had the same issue. It is very surprising for a well known brand as TOTO
customer_reviews.author: Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I had the model with remote control before, but it starte d to leak after four years. I bought this as a replacement and bought the cheapest model. I found it easier to use than the remote and am quite pleased with it. It becomes an essential part of my everyday routine.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Smith

customer_reviews.title: Clean as a Whistle!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. I first saw one while visiting Japan and knew I must have one. We sold our house recently, including the Toto, and the first thing we bought for the new home was a new Toto.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: A new world :) lol
customer_reviews.text: I don t know how I ve been living without this! :) The seat is warm, you can control the temperature. There is an energy save mode as well. You can control the pressure of water. It s just nice comfortable and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Compared with my another Korean brand which out of order in a year, this one last for years and still working
customer_reviews.author: C. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Clean and warm
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this seat. Easy to install and works great. Just note that to use it, you need an electrical outlet near your toilet so you can plug it in
customer_reviews.author: Duane Isaacson

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: easy install, quality construction, great performance...wish I had installed it years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Mark White

customer_reviews.title: Toto simply the Best!
customer_reviews.text: Toto is a fantastic product. Had another brand before, the one made in the Wisconsin company that makes plumbing products and start with K, and it was four times more expensive and broke three times. Now we have three Toto ones and they work extremely well. Never will buy a K again!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Your bum will love you
customer_reviews.text: I got a friend to install since he had a plumbing background but he said it's very easy to install. All of the functions work well and trust me...you'll NEVER NOT use a bidet again!
customer_reviews.author: Davede V.

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love!
customer_reviews.text: I thank my husband after every time I use this device, I absolutely love it! And the fact that I have control over the tempurature and water flow is just a dream.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINA R AMMON

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to install and requires less electricity to operate
customer_reviews.text: This is the basic model but has everything we need. It was easy to install and requires less electricity to operate, compared with a Korean model with more functions. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: NO

customer_reviews.title: I have 2 of these installed in my household. ...
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these installed in my household. I can’t go back to regular toilet seats now! You will also use way less toilet paper, which is a tradeoff for a higher energy bill...but who cares. Only knock is the way the seat slants downward, which is not uncomfortable but takes a little getting used to.
customer_reviews.author: wayne

customer_reviews.title: ONE OF THE GREAT WONDERS OF THE WORLD!!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG you've never known what it means to be truly clean until you've sat on one of these baby's. I'm thinking of putting a flat screen and fridge in my bathroom and just renting out the rest of the house.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bork

customer_reviews.title: Should have done this sooner!
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy assembly. Works like a charm. I would give it 10 stars! Be sure you have an electrical outlet.
customer_reviews.author: SellnMelln

customer_reviews.title: Great product with all necessary functionality!
customer_reviews.text: I used Toto washlet before and like some one said, once you start to use it, you can never stop. This model has all the required functionality and has great price. The installation is super easy, only screw driver is needed. Only draw back is the the water tank might be a little bit small, yet it is good enough for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Guodong Chen

customer_reviews.title: Does what you want!
customer_reviews.text: We had a version of this from 2002. Finally wore out. This new be is fantastic! Very easy to adjust for custom anatomy! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: You need one of these
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for years and this model works great. Keeps you clean and saves on TP. If you don't have one of these, get one.
customer_reviews.author: mr moonlight

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase ever!  Buying a second one.
customer_reviews.text: I came back from Japan as the Pandemic really started to break. These bidets were everywhere, even in public toilets. I can't believe I waited so long to purchase. Installation instructions could certainly be improved, but I finally figured it out! Love this sooooo much!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: After trying 2 of these in our house I will make sure that any time we build a new home it will have one in every bathroom. Fantastic product and highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Senior Seegee

customer_reviews.title: No reason to pay more
customer_reviews.text: So far the bidet is perfect. This model is one of the least expensive, and it does everything it needs to do. I don’t think there’s any reason to buy anything more expensive. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Max Rockertanski

customer_reviews.title: Great if you are looking for elongated
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Great price. TOTO is the best. I just hope they sell the round size at the same price as well. Somehow the round are way more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: BIG HASSLE with Installation
customer_reviews.text: Spent a lot of time trying to get the installation done. HD does not have the parts. Called the seller who referred us to TOTO.
customer_reviews.author: N.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: There is a better TOTO out there that has automatic features with remote. For the money though this was good.
customer_reviews.author: El

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Easy install. My apartment toilet had a metal pipe so I had buy a flexible pipe at Home Depot. There were various size and not expensive.
customer_reviews.author: TAKAO O.

customer_reviews.title: Cannot imagine not having one.  The install was very easy too.
customer_reviews.text: Cannot imagine not having one. The install was very easy too. Simple operation that works!
customer_reviews.author: Road Warrier

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install, heated water is actually really nice. Seat warmer is cool, and overall is a very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: ABCDEF

product_meta.title: TOTO SW2014#01 A100 Electronic Bidet Toilet Cleansing Warm Water and Heated Seat, Elongated, Cotton White
product_meta.description:
Size:Elongated

The TOTO WASHLET A100 Elongated Electric Bidet Toilet Seat delivers ecology-minded luxury with a streamlined design. Unlike traditional toilet paper that can often be rough and ineffective, the WASHLET quickly provides comfortable warm water cleansing at the touch of a button.A once mundane trip to the bathroom can become a spa-like experience with a WASHLET.

The WASHLET A100 is fully automated, featuring a soft rear spray, rear cleanse, and front cleanse with the option of an oscillating stream. The controls are located on a convenient arm control panel. The wand is self-cleaning, automatically cleaning itself before and after every use. The WASHLET features a heated SoftClose seat with three temperature settings. The temperature and pressure of the water are adjustable with three temperature settings and five pressure settings.

Using a WASHLET reduces the need for toilet paper, saving trees and water used to manufacture each roll. As we get older, our mobility can deteriorate and make it increasingly hard to clean ourselves after toileting. Medical conditions and debilitating illnesses can make using the bathroom without assistance almost impossible, but with a WASHLET, you can increase your independence and feel cleaner with just one touch of a button. Includes mounting and connection hardware.


Do not use a loose or faulty electrical outlet
feature_bullets: A REFRESHING CLEAN FOR EVERYONE - Gentle yet powerful water spray provides an effective clean; Adjustable warm water and pressure settings; dual action spray with oscillating option creates a refreshing clean every time

STEP INTO A LAVISH STANDARD OF LIVING - This smart toilet seat is specially contoured for maximum comfort; Adjustable heated bidet seat provides consistent warmth coverage over full seat surface; No more slammed lids with our SoftClose technology
CLEAN INNOVATIONS OFFER PEACE OF MIND - Self-cleaning wand automatically cleans inside and outside before and after each use; Specially designed wand resin helps repel materials

EMBRACE YOUR UNIQUENESS - The convenient side panel allows users to control and set personalized water cleansing settings. Provides luxury and cleanliness at your fingertips; 2 user memory settings for quick access

EXPERIENCE EVERYDAY EXCELLENCE – 50 Million WASHLET users agree TOTO electric bidet toilet seats are trusted and dependable with high-quality design for long lasting benefits; Easy, do-it-yourself installation; Top notch customer service support

specifications.Included Components: Electronic bidet seat, Tee-connector, Mounting bracket
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars521 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
